website_summaries.verdict: This marula oil has satisfied customers who are impressed with how well it makes their skin look and feel. However, it also comes with a few concerns and a high price.
pros: Absorbs quickly and leaves skin feeling soft
Some dedicated users have bragged about noticeable results in about two weeks of use
cons: Not 100% pure, as it has a bit of fragrance
Some concerns if it's authentic, as the scent is harsh and the consistency is on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: Too bad really.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item. It smelled literally like a copper penny to me. I did some research and found out that it has a spa like smell. What was described to me and what I smelled was quite different. The smell was overwhelming and I just could not get past it. Too bad. I really wanted to try out this product, but I feel it probably had gone rancid. It was what I would consider to be brand new packaging. It looked untampered with. Maybe it was old.
customer_reviews.author: Mootsie

customer_reviews.title: A Dream for Older Skin
customer_reviews.text: Marula Oil is AMAZING. It does a beautiful job of smoothing skin. Take time to rub it in as completely as possibly around eyes, mouth, all over the face, neck, and decolletage. For someone with older skin like me it's a dream, but I wouldn't recommend it for someone with young, oily skin. Be sure to tie back your hair before applying or it will make your hair oily.
customer_reviews.author: N. R. Early Byron

customer_reviews.title: Better than all other oils I’ve put on my face
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and rosacea. This is one of the only skin care products I’ve used that results in visibly better skin. I have tried all sorts of oils on my skin (coconut, jojoba, squalene, argon, olive) and none of them made my skin look anything other than oily. I had to use it daily for a few weeks to see a real difference, but it was there. I wish they would change the bottle top. You can never really tighten the top down. You can close it, but I can’t throw it in my gym bag or purse for travel because the top unscrews too easily.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lankin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful results from use of this Marula Facial Oil!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is no longer dry and it has created a moisture level that comments are being made that I have a glow on my face. One person said I was beaming like a person who is about to get married. I love this product. It really works. I am 63 years of age and my skin good again. Not dry like it was before I started using this product.,
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Diana Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have use this oil from a variety of different manufacturers for quite some time. When I saw the quality is advertised I discussed with my aesthetician as this was the most expensive of all of the oils. I’m certainly glad I made the investment it’s not only the most expensive but it’s absolutely the best. I definitely will be switching brands and purchase this brand in the future forever
customer_reviews.author: PRIME MWR MEMBER

customer_reviews.title: Very good for winter-dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Very good for winter-dry skin, leaves skin feeling so soft. Marula oil has healing properties and takes care of a couple of patches of eczema that pop up in my eyebrows now and then. A little goes a long way so the bottle lasts a long time. To me this product is well worth the price and helps to support the women in Africa who produce it.
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be ordering again...
customer_reviews.text: I believe the product isn’t as good as before. Others have remarked about the changes especially noting the smell and I agree. At this price point, quality is everything and I won’t be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Gladone

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper is not always better
customer_reviews.text: I did a side by side comparison of this product with the regularly price marula facial oil ($78) purchased from Soft Surroundings. Although the products look identical with the same packaging I noticed a bit of difference in smell and feel. The product ordered through amazon did not have the pleasant nutty smell and the oil did not absorb as well into the skin. It isn't bad, but it is not quite as good as the regularly priced marula oil. I noticed better results with the regularly priced marula oil versus this product.
customer_reviews.author: NLG

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with full disclosure, I am an old broad. I started using this after cleansing morning and night. And will occasionally "pat" it on during the day over my makeup if I am having a dry skin day. I attribute this (along with a few other products I changed over to) to making my skin look healthy, clear, good color - no more dry red patches - and no more drying out during the day.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Bad botteling
customer_reviews.text: So I really liked this oil BUT the container is awful! 3/4 of my oil if not more ended up going to waste. I travel for work and no matter what I did to try and keep this container closed it would leak. Finally after a day of travel all of the oil was spilled out and gone to waste. For $70 oil and not even getting to use half of it for this reason I won’t purchase again unless they change the bottle type.
customer_reviews.author: rachon potipitak

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this oil! I use it to pat the under-eye area as well as extra moisturization on my face. It feels great and doesn’t break out my sensitive skin. I do it want to go without this since I’ve found it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Oily
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to moisturized my face. It works well especially in the drier months in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Price

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I have tried many others this does what it says I can’t do my skin care routine without it now!
customer_reviews.author: Callie Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil, Price is High
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Marula Oil. However, I think Ill start buying it at dermatology office since their price is similar. Amazon prices are higher.
customer_reviews.author: PatC

customer_reviews.title: An essential for great skin!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily and keeps my skin hydrated all day. Without this, I can see fine lines by mid-day. An essential for skin care!
customer_reviews.author: K. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Too small bottle for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the product a little pricey for a small bottle , was expecting a larger bottle
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil leaves my skin nice and soft. The only thing I don't like it is the tap, it does not close tight, and I lost half of the oil because of the loose tap.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Goodno

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Marula Oil!
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Marula Oil at a FANTASTIC price. I use it every morning mixed with some vitamin C.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!! That’s all I can say really
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! That’s all I can say really. Makes my skin feel and look super soft and has decreased fine lines. It dries absorbs very quickly into the skin and super hydration, as I suffer from dry skin. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Blend a drop with any moisturizer to improve your moisturizer. This stretches the product and makes it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! Smooth and long lasting on your skin. My skin stays smoother , giving it a healthier look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite face oil
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face oil. Nothing else compares. It is very moisturizing and absorbs quickly. I hate when it feels like an oil is just sitting on my skin, instead of sinking in.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on my face
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on my face. Oil works in and does not remain oily, however, I do have dry skin. Don't know if I have noticed a lot of difference in age spots or any other aging going on.
customer_reviews.author: Jody A Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it makes my face look
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it makes my face look..It actually works.. you can see a difference in about a week or 2
customer_reviews.author: ANGELIE M

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: This oil is one of the very best I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: marsha r jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Loved this oil
customer_reviews.text: Loved this marula oil. Makes your face feel so soft, and hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Odgers

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and oily acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I have super oily, acne prone skin and this oil hasn’t increased the oil production nor has it broken out my skin. If anything, it has balanced out the Ph and made my skin very smooth with the addition of using goat milks soap.❤️
customer_reviews.author: brandy prince

customer_reviews.title: Great marula oil at a steal!
customer_reviews.text: This brand marula oil is the one recommended by my facialist. I love this product and this is by far the best price I have seen anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Victoriaf

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil: nice bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than I expected! I use it at night and think it will last a long time. The bottle is lovely and easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. H.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Love this product been using it for a few weeks now and I could see the difference Around my eyes and my chest .
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good facial oil to have in winter time. Moisturizing and softening my skin pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Incredible facial oil
customer_reviews.text: Amazing facial oil. I don't get oily midday when using this. It softens and heals my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in my fab fit fun box and have loved it ever since
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite night product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I put this on at night and my face is rosy in the morning. Lightly scented. Goes on like an oil but gets absorbed quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the best product I've ever tried for my face. It cleared up the dry, flaky patches that no moisturizer could help. It absorbs completely and leaves my skin super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna F Lang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My facialist has noticed the difference in my skin, especially my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the facial oil and will back to purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Louise M. Meaney

customer_reviews.title: Marula Miracle
customer_reviews.text: Makes face so soft as well as body. A little goes a long way. Facial lines are barely visible. Try it you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Adams

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Marula Pure Marula Facial oil for about five months. It is wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good on my hair and delivery was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Josephine M. Borromeo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have lines around my lips. I was going to head to the dermatologist when I saw the reviews on this. The lines haven't disappeared, but they're not as deep and they aren't reddish anymore. I read up on this product, and all parts of this fruit are amazing. I'm hoping they start importing more to the U.S., I'll be the first customer.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: MY SKIN LOOKS GREAT! VERY SATISFIED WITH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: SMELLS AUTHENTIC, FEELS AUTHENTIC, MY SKIN LOOKS GREAT! VERY SATISFIED WITH THE PRICE, BETTER THAN PAYING $80 AT SEPHORA.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product feels wonderful and my face feels rejuvenated in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: William Casby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing face oil! My skin is glowing and is healthy😀
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: passing it on to my best friends too
customer_reviews.text: can't live without it.... passing it on to my best friends too.
customer_reviews.author: whitefeather

customer_reviews.title: My vision was clearly poor with the use of this product
customer_reviews.text: Thus product interfered with my vision. Tried using it for a couple of weeks & my eye sight was seriously effected by the use of thus. My vision was clearly poor with the use of this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glowing soft skin
customer_reviews.text: I first tried Marula oil at a spa in Chicago. I then started ordering it online. Just a few drops and my skin feels like silk. I have combination skin and still this is fine to use. I have used Sunday Riley Juno and yet I still like this one better. **There are times during the summer where i will only use it nightly due to the humidity during the day. This does not make my skin break out at all.
customer_reviews.author: T Baker

customer_reviews.title: this oil in just one day made a great difference. Also
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many products. From the cheapest to the highest and yet, this oil in just one day made a great difference. Also, Amazon price is the best price. After spending so much money, I wish I had known about this product sooner. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Marula oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavenly product. I'm on my 2nd bottle. I will always have a bottle on hand. I feels good, it smells good, its effective.
customer_reviews.author: K. White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love the way this oil makes my face feel
customer_reviews.author: Jane H Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Better Late than Never!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had had access to this product sooner. Still it has done wonders for my 76 year old skin. I have given it to both my daughters and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Marietta P Allmond

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, High Price, Slightly Better Result Than Argan Oil (for this lady).
customer_reviews.text: Nice product that appears to moisturize well. I don't have many visible fine lines on my face, but do notice that my skin texture is a bit more vibrant when using this product. As a test, I applied to the tops of my hands (some sun damage) after a scrub for a couple of weeks and haven't seen anything superior to the body butters with Shea I've used. I've tried Argan oil too, and this product seems to provide a slightly better result on the face. The price, however, would have me rethinking a second purchase. Not to say, I wouldn't, but I'd seriously give it thought.
customer_reviews.author: True Revu

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Leaves you glowing but not oily. Improves skin and pores dramatically. Will definitely purchase over and over again. Being a Sephora junkie, I can say that this is by far the best moisturizer ever. Shipping was fast too. Just remember SPF!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: it's my favorite face oil
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years, it's my favorite face oil. My skin looks great.
customer_reviews.author: nancy n

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several months, and like it a lot. It is a little heavy, and since I have oily skin, I only use it on my cheeks and neck. It made me break out in the t-zone area. For the neck area especially though, it's helped with the beginnings of wrinkles. Smells good, too!
customer_reviews.author: KimmyD

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job on my
customer_reviews.text: So far it started to fix my dry skin. It does a good job on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed! Have some Bu Drunk Elephant and there is ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe this pure Marula facial oil, very disappointed! Have some Bu Drunk Elephant and there is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I like that it absorbs quickly and doesn't have an odor
customer_reviews.text: I like that it absorbs quickly and doesn't have an odor. But I don't see where it's any better than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: S S S

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it ,and says it's a good product
customer_reviews.author: karim shousha

customer_reviews.title: Great product works well on Burns & scars
customer_reviews.text: My sister gave me some because she loved how well it worked on her burns and scars after breast cancer treatment, even now she still loves it and so do I. I gave some to my friends, they all use on face, eyes, neck , etc. great stuff
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Thomas

product_meta.title: Marula Pure Beauty Oil Marula Facial Oil, 1.69 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
A transformation in the world of beauty oils, Pure Marula Facial Oil is light and absorbs into the skin quickly and deeply. Marula Oil provides immediate and long lasting hydration and improved elasticity with 50% more antioxidants than argan oil with no greasy feel.

BRAND STORY
Marula Pure Beauty Oil is a premium brand of highly effective, doctor-endorsed beauty products derived from pure, sustainable Marula oil.
